title: Githyanki Greatsword
content:
rent ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Though heavily decorated and inlaid with rubies, the blade's sharp edge suggests its use isn't merely ornamental.

Githyanki Greatsword Location & Where to Find

Location: Mountain Pass, The Risen Road Dropped by: Sarth Baretha loot.

Githyanki Greatsword Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 360
